biography.bio: Leopold Rudolf was born on May 3, 1911 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Radetzkymarsch (1965), Der Rabe (1951) and Tod eines Handlungsreisenden (1963). He was married to Marion Degler. He died on June 4, 1978 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Leopold Rudolf

biography.bio: Helmuth Lohner was born on April 24, 1933 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor and director, known for Widower with 5 Daughters (1957), Don Juan oder Die Liebe zur Geometrie (1965) and Tarabas (1981). He was married to Elisabeth Gürtler, Karin Baal, Susanne Cramer and Ricarda Reinisch. He died on June 23, 2015 in Vienna.
biography.name: Helmuth Lohner

biography.bio: Hertha Martin was born on March 17, 1930 in Baden, Lower Austria, Austria. She is an actress, known for Die Nackten kleiden (1963), Der Heldenmantel (1967) and Radetzkymarsch (1965).
biography.name: Hertha Martin

biography.bio: Manfred Inger was born on January 1, 1907 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Fred Lorenz. He was an actor, known for Napoleon in New Orleans (1959), Les Soldats ne sont pas de bois (1958) and Das Märchen (1966). He died on July 25, 1984 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Manfred Inger

biography.bio: Fritz Eckhardt was born on November 30, 1907 in Linz, Upper Austria, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and writer, known for Hallo - Hotel Sacher... Portier! (1973), Tatort (1970) and Wenn der Vater mit dem Sohne (1971). He was married to Hilde Priebitzer. He died on December 31, 1995 in Klosterneuburg, Lower Austria, Austria.
biography.name: Fritz Eckhardt

biography.placeOfBirth: Aussig, Austria-Hungary [now Ustí nad Labem, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Jane Tilden was born on November 16, 1910 in Aussig, Austria-Hungary as Marianne Wilhelmine Tuch. She was an actress, known for Tales from the Vienna Woods (1979), Donauwalzer (1984) and The Good Soldier Schweik (1960). She was married to Sidney John Blackburne, Alexander Steinbrecher and Erik Frey. She died on August 27, 2002 in Kitzbühel, Tyrol, Austria.
biography.name: Jane Tilden

biography.bio: Rudolf Rhomberg was born on February 1, 1920 in Dornbirn, Austria. He was an actor, known for Italienische Nacht (1966), Die Mühle (1967) and Das Ende vom Anfang (1963). He died on June 6, 1968 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Rudolf Rhomberg

biography.bio: Eva Fiebig was born on May 21, 1900 in Berlin, Germany. She was an actress, known for Im Banne der Guarneri (1953), Mr. Gillie (1957) and Das Mietshaus (1964). She died on October 21, 1984 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Eva Fiebig

biography.bio: Karl Ehmann was born on August 13, 1882 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor and director, known for Durch Nacht und Eis (1926), Der Doppelselbstmord (1918) and Die gekreuzigt werden... (1920). He died on November 1, 1967 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Karl Ehmann

biography.bio: Pit Krüger was born on August 1, 1934 in Mannheim, Baden-Württemberg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Younger and Younger (1993), Fernfahrer (1963) and Der deutsche Meister (1968). He was married to Ingrid Krüger. He died on November 6, 2003 in Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany.
biography.name: Pit Krüger

biography.bio: Erich Auer was born on April 14, 1923 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for The Monastery's Hunter (1953), Der Pfarrer von St. Michael (1957) and Der Herrgottschnitzer von Ammergau (1952). He was married to Martha Wallner. He died on December 17, 2004 in Vienna.
biography.name: Erich Auer

biography.bio: Alfred Böhm was born on March 23, 1920 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for Der Leihopa (1985), Der Bockerer (1981) and Familie Leitner (1958). He died on September 22, 1995 in Ströblitz, Lower Austria, Austria.
biography.name: Alfred Böhm

biography.bio: Peter Gerhard was born on August 20, 1907 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Premier avril an 2000 (1952), The Story of Vickie (1954) and Leinen aus Irland (1965). He died on June 29, 1994 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Peter Gerhard

biography.bio: Walter Sedlmayr was loved by his audience very much, but nobody knew the real Sedlmayr. He always kept his privat life very private, and it was revealed after his death that he was homosexual. He couldn't come out as a homosexual for different reasons, but the main reason was surely his reputation as a typical bavarian man. When he was brutally killed, it was rumoured that a young prostitute could have killed him, but it was found out that two very close friends and businesspartners killed him. The people were shocked by the brutality of his senseless death
biography.name: Walter Sedlmayr

biography.bio: Erwin Strahl was born on February 12, 1929 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor and director, known for Les honneurs de la guerre (1961), Face of the Frog (1959) and Sacred Lie (1954). He was married to Waltraut Haas and Franca Parisi. He died on April 20, 2011 in Vienna.
biography.name: Erwin Strahl
